resources:
NoSnooze + Done"
Randomize interaction: The Interaction will be randomized between all the types below.
Matching color in photo: Take a photo with the average color similar to the prompted color.
Taking 10 steps: Take ten steps by walking around in your room with your phone in your hand
Shaking the phone: Grab your phone and shake it as hard as you can.
Sorting numbers: Sort the 5 numbers from lowest to highest.
Unlocking the lock: Tilt your phone in different angles.
1. Randomize interaction
2. Matching color in photo
3. Taking 10 steps
4. Shaking the phone
5. Sorting numbers
6. Unlocking the lock
